z.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

details.history: The dungeon was created by a neutral wizard as a maze. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 100 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.2: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.3: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.4: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.5: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.6: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, consumed by disease and madness
